001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.BatchLossFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.DimensionLossFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.SampleLossFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
012
013import java.util.*;
014
015/**
016 * The implementation of the {@link ObjectiveFunction}.
017 *
018 * <p>
019 * {@code ObjectiveFunctionImpl} composes together different levels of
020 * loss functions — dimension, sample, and batch — to provide a complete
021 * objective function suitable for training and optimization.
022 * </p>
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * The implementation delegates responsibility as follows:
026 * <ul>
027 *   <li>Uses a {@link DimensionLossFunction} to compute per-dimension error
028 *       and parameterGradients.</li>
029 *   <li>Uses a {@link SampleLossFunction} to aggregate dimension-level losses
030 *       into a single sample loss.</li>
031 *   <li>Uses a {@link BatchLossFunction} to aggregate sample losses into a
032 *       batch loss.</li>
033 * </ul>
034 * </p>
035 */
036@Mediator
037@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
038public class ObjectiveFunctionImpl<N extends Number> implements ObjectiveFunction<N> {
039
040    private final Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations = new LinkedHashSet<>();
041
042    private final SampleLossFunction<N> sampleLossFunction;
043    private final List<DimensionLossFunction<N>> dimensionLossFunctions;
044    private final BatchLossFunction<N> batchLossFunction;
045    private final boolean optimize;
046
047    /**
048     * Creates an {@code ObjectiveFunctionImpl} that computes losses at all levels:
049     * dimension, sample, and batch.
050     *
051     * <p>This constructor links together the components needed for hierarchical
052     * loss computation:</p>
053     * <ul>
054     *     <li>{@link BatchLossFunction}: computes the total loss over a batch of samples.</li>
055     *     <li>{@link SampleLossFunction}: computes the loss for a single sample by
056     *         aggregating per-dimension losses.</li>
057     *     <li>{@link DimensionLossFunction}: computes the loss for each individual
058     *         output dimension.</li>
059     * </ul>
060     *
061     * @param batchLossFunction      the loss function for the batch level
062     * @param sampleLossFunction     the loss function for the sample level
063     * @param dimensionLossFunctions the list of loss functions for each output dimension
064     */
065    public ObjectiveFunctionImpl(BatchLossFunction<N> batchLossFunction, SampleLossFunction<N> sampleLossFunction, List<DimensionLossFunction<N>> dimensionLossFunctions, boolean optimize) {
066        this.batchLossFunction = batchLossFunction;
067        this.sampleLossFunction = sampleLossFunction;
068        this.dimensionLossFunctions = dimensionLossFunctions;
069        this.optimize = optimize;
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * {@inheritDoc}
074     */
075    @Override
076    public boolean isOptimization() {
077        return optimize;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * {@inheritDoc}
082     */
083    @Override
084    public void addRegularization(ExplicitRegularization<N> regularization) {
085        regularizations.add(regularization);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * {@inheritDoc}
090     */
091    @Override
092    public void removeRegularization(ExplicitRegularization<N> regularization) {
093        regularizations.remove(regularization);
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * {@inheritDoc}
098     */
099    @Override
100    public Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> getRegularizations() {
101        return Collections.unmodifiableSet(regularizations);
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * {@inheritDoc}
106     */
107    @Override
108    public N calculateLossWithoutRegularizationPenalty(List<Pair<Array<N>, Array<N>>> batch) {
109        List<N> sampleLosses = new ArrayList<>(batch.size());
110        List<N> dimensionLosses = new ArrayList<>();
111        for (Pair<Array<N>, Array<N>> sample : batch) {
112            Array<N> estimated = sample.left();
113            Array<N> target = sample.right();
114            int dimensions = estimated.length();
115            for (int d = 0; d < dimensions; d++) {
116                dimensionLosses.add(getDimensionLossFunction(d).calculateDimensionLoss(estimated.get(d), target.get(d)));
117            }
118            sampleLosses.add(sampleLossFunction.calculateSampleLoss(dimensionLosses));
119            dimensionLosses.clear();
120        }
121        return batchLossFunction.calculateBatchLoss(sampleLosses);
122    }
123
124    @Override
125    public N calculateRegularizationPenalty(Array<N> parameters) {
126        N totalPenalty = getNumberTypeSupport().zero();
127        for (ExplicitRegularization<N> regularization : regularizations) {
128            totalPenalty = getNumberTypeSupport().add(totalPenalty, regularization.lossPenalty(parameters));
129        }
130        return totalPenalty;
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * {@inheritDoc}
135     */
136    @Override
137    public Array<N> calculateGradient_dJ_da(int batchSize, Array<N> estimated, Array<N> target) {
138        int dimensions = target.length();
139        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = getNumberTypeSupport();
140        Array<N> gradients = typeSupport.createArray(dimensions);
141        for (int d = 0; d < dimensions; d++) {
142            gradients.set(d, typeSupport.multiply(typeSupport.multiply(
143                            batchLossFunction.calculateGradient_dJ_dL(batchSize),
144                            sampleLossFunction.calculateGradient_dL_dl(dimensions)),
145                    getDimensionLossFunction(d).calculateGradient_dl_da(estimated.get(d), target.get(d))));
146        }
147        return gradients;
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public N regularizedGradient(N parameter) {
152        N totalAdjustment = getNumberTypeSupport().zero();
153        for (ExplicitRegularization<N> regularization : regularizations) {
154            totalAdjustment = getNumberTypeSupport().add(totalAdjustment, regularization.gradientAdjustment(parameter));
155        }
156        return totalAdjustment;
157    }
158
159    private DimensionLossFunction<N> getDimensionLossFunction(int d) {
160        return dimensionLossFunctions.get(d % dimensionLossFunctions.size());
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * {@inheritDoc}
165     */
166    @Override
167    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getNumberTypeSupport() {
168        return batchLossFunction.getNumberTypeSupport();
169    }
170}
